unnormalised: AI veganch vegim vikas zata! GPT-4 hak 1.76 trillion parameters asat, punn fuddarachim models ten'na gunn vaddunk xoktat, zaka Google-chea TPUs sarkem vixex hardware lagta chokachik cholpak & training korpak $100M+ kharch yetalo.
normalised: A-I veganch vegant vikass zata asa! G-P-T-four haka eka point saat saat trillion parameters asa, punn fuddarache models haka dha pat zait, taka Google che T-P-Us sarkhe khas hardware lagtat bare tareen cholpaak ani training korpak dollar ekho shat koti plus kharch zait.
text: AI veganch vegim vikas zata! GPT-4 hak 1.76 trillion parameters asat, punn fuddarachim models ten'na gunn vaddunk xoktat, zaka Google-chea TPUs sarkem vixex hardware lagta chokachik cholpak & training korpak $100M+ kharch yetalo.
